interest_drivers: Introduction of Gen-4 Turbo and Gen-3 Alpha Turbo AI models
Pricing strategy for AI tools and content creation features
ai_analysis.summary: Runway's pricing page reveals a tiered plan structure with varying levels of access to AI tools, including generative video and image models, indicating a strategic move to expand its user base and monetize its AI capabilities.
